name: Cursed Dungeon Raider
description:
This game was created in two weeks for the 2021 Unity x Humble Bundle Showcase. You can rate the game here.

Description

It is an Indiana Jones / Tomb Raider like horror game, where you have to recover real historic artifacts from excavation sites, which are filled with traps and monsters.

Sell those artifacts at a museum to gain archaeological reputation and get access to new excavation sites or sell them on the black market to earn more money and buy new exciting equipment (not integrated yet).

Feedback

If you have any ideas, criticism or feedback, let me know in the comments. Moreover, if a lot of people like this game, I can work on it further and publish it on Steam.

You find more of my games on itch.io, Google Play Store or Steam.
